meanings.definition: A small, unlicensed taxi that typically carries a small number of passengers.
meanings.sent1: The minicabs lined up outside the airport were ready to take passengers to their hotels.
meanings.sent2: I called a minicab to take me to the train station.
meanings.sent3: Why did the minicab refuse to pick up the group of tourists? Because it was too small for all of them!
meanings.sent4: The minicabs zipped through the city streets like colorful beetles.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow minicab stood out among the regular taxis, attracting customers easily.

meanings.sent1: We decided to minicab to the concert to avoid parking hassles.
meanings.sent2: She minicabbed to work every day to save time.
meanings.sent3: He minicabbed to the party and arrived in style.
meanings.sent4: The couple minicabbed to the restaurant for a romantic date night.
meanings.sent5: They minicabbed to the beach, enjoying the scenic route along the coast.
